OrgName.entry: SHEFFIELD ROYAL SOCIETY FOR THE BLIND, THE (SRSB)

Desc.entry: A registered charity which offers a wide range of services to visually impaired people of all ages in Sheffield, including social and activities centre, equipment shop, community advice service (including welfare rights), Carers' Support Scheme, sports groups, self-help/support groups and a residential home. Also agents for Talking Book Service and British Wireless for the Blind Fund. Company limited by guarantee no 3053277.
